<Item id="We do know that the software has to be further developed. We don't have
the
viewer and we don't have the writer or converter. WE cannot do
research
or partner or do anything until the viewer, writer are developed." alignment="1" arrowcolor="-16776961" arrowsize="1" backgroundcolor="-1" foregroundcolor="-16777216" initialexpanded="0" linecolor="-16776961" linesize="1" fontsize="1" wordwrap="on" justify="center">

Item.id: But how far do u take it? Do you need the context or is it a luxury? Do you need a top portions to see business context? Do you need various versions… content business vs tools business? How far do you take it?

SINCE WE CANNOT PREDICT, WE NEED TO HAVE A MULTI-PURPOSE TOOL… It would have to be good enough for research, for partnership and for VC attraction. SO, it must be as realistic as possible and even incorporate the browser.
